inclusion.criterion: absence of respiratory infection or COPD exacerbation in the 4 previous weeks to baseline visit
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: patients who have given written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: current or previous cancer history (even if the patient has been diagnosed >5 years and there is no evidence of recurrence of disease)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old Spanish man presenting with shortness of breath. He has COPD since 2 years ago, smokes 20 cigarettes per day, and uses Flomax for BPH.
